material: cast iron dumbbells with neoprene coating, plastic rack
usage: Light weight training and toning exercises at home or in fitness classes, with organized storage on the included stand.
key_features: Easy-grip neoprene coating for a secure hold
Printed weight number on each end cap
Color-coded dumbbells for quick identification (0.5Kg Purple, 1Kg Red, 1.5Kg Blue)
Hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling away
Ideal for fitness classes or at-home workout routines
Includes 6 cast iron neoprene-coated dumbbells in 3 weight categories with a storage stand
ai_description: Compact KAKSS dumbbell set featuring three color-coded pairs: purple 0.5 kg, red 1 kg, and blue 1.5 kg. Each hex-shaped, neoprene-coated dumbbell has the brand and weight printed on the ends. A black, tree-shaped plastic stand neatly holds all six weights on a clean white backdrop.
target_audience: Home fitness users, beginners, and class participants seeking light, color-coded dumbbells with a compact rack.
product_name: KAKSS Supreme Quality Neoprene Dumbbell With Stand 6Kg (0.5kg + 1kg + 1.5kg Pair)
